name: that blue dragon
description:
my final uni project about the struggles of depression. i was making it in the very beginning of my depression treatment, while reflecting on everything i've done before

the game has 2 endings that depend on your choices

all character models can be rotated here

controls:

  • wasd - move
  • mouse - camera
  • tab - open notebook
  • e - pick up item/interact
  • o - current objective
